item.title: copy-sync
item.description: copySync(src, dest, [options]) Copy a file or directory. The directory can have contents. Like cp -r. src <String> dest <String> options <Object> overwrite <boolean>: overwrite existing file or directory, default is true. Note that the copy operation will silently fail if you set this to false and the destination exists. Use the errorOnExist option to change this behavior. errorOnExist <boolean>: when overwrite is false and the destination exists, throw an
